amendment.description: Amendment provides $50,000 to the Federal Communications Commission for action in the area of caller ID fraud.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and immediately decrease funding for the FCC in order to encourage the FCC to promulgate a rule on caller ID services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Murphy.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
